column1: 839915,Footwear Factory Worker,,"Assemble, form and finish footwear
column3: Cut fabrics, textiles, leather or hide
column7: Operate textile or leather cutting or production equipment
column13: Draw guide lines or markings on materials or work pieces using patterns or other references
column15: Package products for storage or shipment
column17: Align parts or work pieces for assembly
column19: Inspect textile, hide or leather products
column21: Attach decorative or functional accessories to products
column23: Program equipment to perform production tasks
column25: Measure materials to mark reference points, cutting lines or other indicators
column27: Clean work pieces or finished products
column29: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column31: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
column33: Read work orders or other instructions to determine product specifications or materials requirements
column35: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column39: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column43: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs",0.1094890510948905
